about_the_game:
Bring all of the SinVR girls that you already own, into the Forbidden World!

We are Sinners: Please forgive us for our transgressions!
The true sequel to SinVR is finally here. And it's.... more SinVR!
Your wildest dreams, made virtually real!

PENETRATE DEEPER into the Forbidden World
Select your female partners and take them on magical journeys into your darkest fantasies!

The Forbidden World awaits
Do you have it in you, to partake in all its carnal glory?

A Truly Wicked Experience
Bring any girl that you already own from SinVR, Space SEX, Fright Night Sex Fest, Girl Next Door or Costume Party into Forbidden World! Collect them all!

Forbidden Features:
  • A collection of interactive PC experiences unlike any other!
  • Nostalgic for 128-bit console era graphics? We got you covered!
  • Dozens of different sex positions
  • Explore a growing library of girls and scenes
  • Many different girl/scene combinations
  • No 'A.I.'. Our girls are 'dumb as a doornail', but with lots of attitude!
  • Supports VR mode, for Vive, Oculus and Windows Mixed Reality headsets
  • Two girls at once! SinVR 2! Get it?

Purchasable Content Upgrades:
  • One group of girls, one scene and all the SinVR girls you own included free!
  • Take any girls into any scene (mix and match)
  • Build your massive harem by purchasing SinVR games and DLC's: SinVR publisher page

content_descriptors.notes: This game features nudity, adult language, consensual sex and playful spanking.  All the characters in the game are 18 years old and over.

name: SinVR 2: Forbidden World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or greater
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or greater
  • Processor: Intel i5-6500 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 or AMD R9 390 equivalent or greater

short_description: PENETRATE DEEPER into the Forbidden World. Fulfill your fantasies in your own private dungeon. From the creators of SinVR, Forbidden World is the destination for provocative and amusing adult entertainment, for your PC or in VR.
